Couronne Scribble Shooter de la sauveuse ultime de PlayStation®Home (femme)

Ultimate Scribble Shooter PlayStation®Home Savior Crown (Women)
Scribble Shooter終極PlayStation®Home拯救者皇冠（女用）

Ultimate Scribble Shooter PlayStation®Home Savior Crown (female)
kDesc
Only the true PlayStation®Home Saviour can wear the Scribble Shooter Crown, but if you don't have the skills to make this happen, you can always buy it. [#Legal]
Seule une véritable sauveuse de PlayStation®Home est digne de la couronne Scribble Shooter, mais si vous n'avez pas vraiment le talent, il vous suffit de l'acheter. [#Legal]
Nur echte PlayStation®Home-Retterinnen verdienen es, diese "Scribble Shooter"-Krone zu tragen. Wer nicht das Können hat, sie zu verdienen, kann sie aber immer noch kaufen. [#Legal]
Solo la vera salvatrice di PlayStation®Home può indossare questa Corona di Scribble Shooter, ma se non sei stata abbastanza abile da meritartela, puoi sempre acquistarla. [#Legal]
Solo la verdadera salvadora de PlayStation®Home puede llevar esta corona de Scribble Shooter, pero si no eres capaz de lograrlo, siempre puedes comprártela. [#Legal]
真の救世主のみかぶることができる冠だが、購入することだってできる！\n\n※こちらのアイテムを着用し、【アバターのカスタマイズ】＞【セーブ/ロード】＞【セーブ】を行いますと、【スロット】内に画像が表示されません。[#Legal]
진정한 홈의 영웅만이 이 스크리블 슈터 왕관을 착용할 수 있습니다. 영웅이 아닌 사람도 구매는 물론 할 수 있습니다.[#Legal]
Only the true PlayStation®Home Savior can wear the Scribble Shooter Crown, but if you don't have the skills to make this happen, you can always buy it.[#Legal]
只有真正的PlayStation®Home拯救者才能戴上Scribble Shooter皇冠。但就算你能力不勝任，你還能購買皇冠。[#Legal]
只有真正的PlayStation®Home拯救者才能戴上Scribble Shooter皇冠。但就算你能力不勝任，你還能購買皇冠。[#Legal]
Only the true PlayStation®Home Savior can wear the Scribble Shooter Crown, but if you don't have the skills to make this happen, you can always buy it.[#Legal]
